name: Traveler's Choice - Individual
desc: Enjoy $60 in savings! Get unlimited free travel documents, swift processing, and our premium photo service for one traveler. Ideal for visas requiring embassy processing.

name: Trip Assurance
desc: Worry-free travel planning! In case of trip cancellation, we'll process a new application with no additional fee ($5/person).

name: Priority Concierge
desc: Your application is our priority! Receive a 1-hour response, 24/7, from our concierge team to assist with your visa application (60).
